message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product for $11000. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a high-value item that I'm confident you'll find valuable. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand you have a limited budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I can meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll make a counteroffer of $10500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10200 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm getting closer to your budget, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $10200 to $11000, but I can do a bit better than that. I'll make a final offer of $10800. This is my best price, and I think it's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand you've made a final offer, but I'm not willing to go below my minimum price of $12000. I'm confident that the product is worth this amount to you, and I'm willing to hold firm on the price. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
